H0.text: The Tropic of Capricorn crosses the west coast of South America in which country. Peru

H2.text: The Tropic of Capricorn crosses the west coast of South America in which country. Colombia

H3.text: The Tropic of Capricorn crosses the west coast of South America in which country. Cile
